title: List of counties in Nevada
summary: There are 16 counties and 1 independent city in the U.S. state of Nevada. On November 25, 1861, the first Nevada Territorial Legislature established 9 counties.[1] Nevada was admitted to the Union on October 31, 1864 with 11 counties.[1] In 1969, Ormsby County and Carson City were consolidated into a single municipal government known as Carson City.[1]
